import React from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import img1 from "./img1.jpg" import img2 from "./img2.jpg" import img3 from "./img3.jpg" import img4 from "./img4.jpg" import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ grid: { flexGrow: 1, minHeight:"90vh", marginTop:"3rem auto 0 auto ", }, description:{ position:"absolute", left:"0px", bottom:"20px", zIndex:1, width:"100%", padding:"15px", textAlign:"center", color:"#FFF3FA", fontSize:"18px", height:"auto", overflow:"hidden", }, heading:{ marginBottom:"15px", color:"#fff", fontWeight:700, fontSize:"2rem", }, mon:{ color:"#ED5E93",fontWeight:700,fontSize:"2rem" }, typ:{ fontSize:"20px", }, desc:{ marginTop:"10px", width:"90%", }, uicard:{ width:"300px", height:'70vh', background:"radial-gradient(#111 50%,#000 100% )", overflow:"hidden", position:"relative", }, img:{ width:"100%", display:"block", transform:"scale(1.3)", transition:"all 0.3s ease-out", zIndex:10, opacity:0.7, '&:hover': { transform:"scale(1.2) transLateY(-1px) ", opacity:0.3 } }, detail:{ fontSize:"1.2rem", fontWeight:500, }, button:{ color:"#fff", background:"red", display:"inline-block", padding:"10px 25px ", textDecoration:"none", borderRadius:"5px", } })) const Recom = () => { const classes=useStyles() return ( <>
